500.description: Internal Server Error - Database or system error

403.description: Forbidden - User not member of tenant

get.summary: Get recent unique searches for current user
get.description: Returns recent unique search queries for the authenticated user. Used by Quick Search card to show search history.

200.description: OK - Recent searches for current user

400.description: Bad Request - No active tenant or validation error

get.description: Returns the most frequently searched queries across the workspace. Used by Search Intelligence card for analytics.

200.description: OK - Top search queries with counts

400.description: Bad Request - No active tenant or validation error

get.summary: Get search analytics metrics with optional comparison
get.description: Returns core search metrics including total searches, success rate, latency stats, and search type breakdown. Optionally includes trend comparison with previous period.

200.description: OK - Search analytics metrics with optional trends

400.description: Bad Request - No active tenant or validation error

get.summary: Get search volume time series data
get.description: Returns search volume aggregated by hour or day for charting search activity over time.

200.description: OK - Time series data for search volume

400.description: Bad Request - No active tenant or validation error

get.summary: Get comprehensive search analytics with optional sections
get.description: Returns detailed search analytics including core metrics and optionally: performance by search type, user behavior stats, and response time distribution. Used for detailed analytics dashboards.

400.description: Bad Request - No active tenant or validation error

get.summary: Get indexing status with stats, worker health, problems, and optional recent jobs
get.description: Returns comprehensive indexing status for the current workspace. Use includeRecent for recently indexed documents and includeRecentJobs for job history across all documents.

200.description: OK - Indexing status for current workspace

400.description: Bad Request - No active tenant selected
